3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness, proper corner geometry, and depth.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Perfect correspondence between the 2D layout and 3D walls, including the utility room and foyer.

interior_elements.notes: All furniture and fixtures (kitchen stove, bathroom sink, bed, sofa) are accurately placed.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. Points deducted for residual text labels/UI artifacts on the balcony and utility area.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan remain visible/rendered in the 3D space near the balcony and utility zones.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D conversion that preserves the exact layout and spatial intent of the original floor plan.
